entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of snow. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 10. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clearing. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Monday 20 March 2023
